roleset.name: trade
roleset.note: BARTER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'barter' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 13.6. No Framenet entry, which surprises me. (from barter.01-v predicate notes)
BARTER-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on WN eventive nouns, BOLT, barter.01. Corresponds to VNcls exchange-13.6. (from barter.01-n)

role.descr: other item in exchange, price, or premium, traded for or at

example.name: two args
example.text: [What Aeroflot doesn't pour into its own gas-guzzling Ilyushins]*-1 is bartered [*-1]to the airport authority, which resells it to 11 Western carriers including Air France, Trans World Airlines and Pakistan International Airlines.
example.arg: to the airport authority, which resells it to 11 Western carriers including Air France, Trans World Airlines and Pakistan International Airlines

example.name: all args
example.text: John bartered his eternal soul to the devil for one good night's sleep.

example.name: args 0, 2
example.text: His barter with Lady Stanley soon disrupts the initial meaning of "mistress":

example.name: args 0, 1, 3
example.text: Musa's Mecca trip and his barter of gold for books and scholars would soon establish Mali as one of the intellectual capitals of the world.
